description:
雅思听力短语是大家在记忆雅思听力词汇的时候一定要关注的一类，因为听力听到的话是属于口语的一部分，而口语中，短语是最常见的。下面就为大家搜集整理了20个雅思听力场景短语，非常少，方便大家记忆。 　　

1、a change of pace 节奏变换 　　You can’t do these chemistryexperiments all day long. You certainly need a change of pace。

2、 a far cry from 相距甚远 　　The published book is far cry from the early manuscript。 　　

3、 and how 的确 　　A: She’s a good dancer。 　　B: and how。 　　

4、 a matter of time 时间问题 　　It is only a matter of time。 　　

5、 a phone call away 一个电话之远、愿意过来帮忙。 　　If you need my help, do let me know. Just remember I am a phone call away。 　　

6、 a while back 不久以前 　　

7、all along 一直 　　I knew it all along。

8、 anything but 绝对不 　　I was anything but happy about going。

9、 account for 解释 　　How do you account for it?

10、 after all 到底 　　A: I’ve just seen the X-rays and your teeth look just fine。 　　B: I see. Then there is nothing to worry about after all。

11、 allergic to 对|……过敏 　　Oh man! Something in this room is making my eyes itch. I must be allergicto something。

12、 at sb’s service 愿为某人服务 　　I am at your service at any time。

13、 around the clock 24小时不停 　　Martha studied around the clock for management exam。

14、 as far as I know 就我所知

15、at home with 对…。.很熟悉 　　She is at home with problems like this。

16、 back out 　　1) 退出 　　A: Wasn’t Bert supposed to sing tonight? 　　B: Yes、 but he backed out at last minute 　　2)不履行 　　She finally backed out of her promise。

17、 be cut out for 天生适合 　　I’m not cut out to be a hero。

18、 be absorbed in 　　She has been absorbed in a horrorfiction. I can’t tear her away。

19、 be addicted to 对……上瘾 　　She has been addicted to drugs for years。

20、be attached to 对……有感情 　　A: I’m amazed that you are still driving that old car of yours. I thought you would have gotten rid of it years ago。 　　B: It runs well and I’ve actually been quite attached to it。

以上就是这20个雅思听力场景短语的全部内容，大家可以看到这些雅思听力短语在各种场景中都非常常见，非常值得记忆。大家在自己的雅思听力备考中也可以找到常用的短语进行适当的记忆，这样有助于听力成绩的提高。
